thread.title: Mariah Blackmon
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Mariah Blackmon

author: Mariah Blackmon
title: Mariah Blackmon
text: I always go to see David J. Roselli I been going to him for about 6 or 7 years now. He's the best.. and HONEST TOO.. So go ask for DJ at Gardner-White on Hayes Rd. Located in Macomb Township, Mi. The delivery man was nice and respectable. Just awesome service all around .
